ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2701_1031_01_10:
My battle strategy is
different from others...
ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2701_1031_02_10:
Whittle them down with
status conditions...
ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2701_0701_01_10:
There are numerous methods
for fighting in a Pokémon battle!
ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2701_0701_02_10:
Dominating the battlefield with powerful
attacks is one way, but using logic and
strategy can win battles as well.
ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2701_0701_03_10:
Pokémon that seem weak at a glance can
actually be very effective in battle by
utilizing status conditions and stat changes!
ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2701_0701_04_10:
That’s the strategy my Pokémon and I
often use when we battle.
ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2701_0702_01_10:
Even if you don’t have a type
advantage over your opponent,
it’s still possible to triumph!
ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2701_0702_02_10:
Pokémon battles aren’t just about
raw strength—they’re about strategy, too.
ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2701_0702_03_10:
That’s the focus of my research, actually,
and it’s why I’ve come to participate
in the PML!
ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2702_0701_02_10:
They also happen to share an uncanny
resemblance to a Poké Ball! I’ve
always wondered why that is!
ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2702_0701_03_10:
In fact, I’ve dedicated my research
to solving that very mystery!
ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2702_0702_01_10:
Which came first, the Voltorb
or the Poké Ball...
ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2703_1031_01_10:
Pssst. I’ve got some intel.
Want some intel?
ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2703_1031_02_10:
It’s really good intel.
Believe me—it’s good.
ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2703_1031_03_10:
It’s super top secret intel
about that professor.
ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2703_0701_01_10:
Ah, hello there, Trainer. As thanks for
coming over to chat, I’ll give you
some useful information.
ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2703_0701_02_10:
Combining certain moves together
can give you an incredible
advantage in battle.
ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2703_0701_03_10:
If you try using low-accuracy moves
after using Telekinesis on a Pokémon...
ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2703_0701_04_10:
you’ll find that even the low-accuracy
moves will be mysteriously on-target!
ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2703_0701_05_10: So? Was that helpful for you?
ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2703_0702_01_10:
Try experimenting with different
combinations the next time you battle!
ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2703_0702_02_10:
I guarantee your battling will be
even more enjoyable!
ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2751_1031_01_10:
There’s way too much stuff
I know nothing about.
ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2751_1031_02_10:
It would take forever 
to research it all. There’s 
no way I’m doing that!
ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2751_1032_01_10:
Why don’t people ever
use them?!
ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2751_1032_02_10:
If you simply TRIED using
one, you’d see how
convenient they are!
ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2751_1032_03_10:
I gotta spread the word...
People need to know.
ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2751_0701_01_10:
Tell me—why doesn’t anyone bother to read
level-up manuals?! They’re extremely useful!
ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2751_0701_02_10:
Huh? What are you talking about?
I’ve never heard of a level-up manual.
ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2751_0701_03_10:
If you train using level-up manuals, you can 
gain experience without having to battle!
Convenient, right?
ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2751_0701_04_10:
Interesting... So where can I get ahold
of those? Can I buy them somewhere?
ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2751_0701_05_10:
They’re available for purchase at the
shop, but you can also receive them as
a log-in bonus sometimes!
ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2751_0701_06_10: Really? I might already have some, then...
ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2751_0701_07_10:
Why don’t you try checking your bag?
See if you have any level-up manuals
you can train with!
